00053 static void rna_Lamp_buffer_size_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00054 {
00055     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00056 
00057     CLAMP(value, 512, 10240);
00058     la->bufsize = value;
00059     la->bufsize &= (~15); /* round to multiple of 16 */
00060 }
00061 
00062 static PointerRNA rna_Lamp_sky_settings_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00063 {
00064     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_LampSkySettings, ptr->id.data);
00065 }
00066 
00067 static void rna_Lamp_mtex_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00068 {
00069     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00070     rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, (void*)la->mtex, sizeof(MTex*), MAX_MTEX, 0, NULL);
00071 }
00072 
00073 static PointerRNA rna_Lamp_active_texture_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00074 {
00075     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00076     Tex *tex;
00077 
00078     tex = give_current_lamp_texture(la);
00079     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_Texture, tex);
00080 }
00081 
00082 static void rna_Lamp_active_texture_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00083 {
00084     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00085 
00086     set_current_lamp_texture(la, value.data);
00087 }
00088 
00089 static StructRNA* rna_Lamp_refine(struct PointerRNA *ptr)
00090 {
00091     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00092 
00093     switch (la->type) {
00094         case LA_LOCAL:
00095             return &RNA_PointLamp;
00096         case LA_SUN:
00097             return &RNA_SunLamp;
00098         case LA_SPOT:
00099             return &RNA_SpotLamp;
00100         case LA_HEMI:
00101             return &RNA_HemiLamp;
00102         case LA_AREA:
00103             return &RNA_AreaLamp;
00104         default:
00105             return &RNA_Lamp;
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void rna_Lamp_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00110 {
00111     Lamp *la = ptr->id.data;
00112 
00113     DAG_id_tag_update(&la->id, 0);
00114     if (scene->gm.matmode == GAME_MAT_GLSL)
00115         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_LAMP|ND_LIGHTING_DRAW, la);
00116     else
00117         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_LAMP|ND_LIGHTING, la);
00118 }
00119 
00120 static void rna_Lamp_draw_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00121 {
00122     Lamp *la = ptr->id.data;
00123 
00124     DAG_id_tag_update(&la->id, 0);
00125     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_LAMP|ND_LIGHTING_DRAW, la);
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void rna_Lamp_sky_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00129 {
00130     Lamp *la = ptr->id.data;
00131 
00132     DAG_id_tag_update(&la->id, 0);
00133     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_LAMP|ND_SKY, la);
00134 }
00135 
00136 /* only for rad/deg conversion! can remove later */
00137 static float rna_Lamp_spot_size_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00138 {
00139     Lamp *la = ptr->id.data;
00140     return DEG2RADF(la->spotsize);
00141 }
00142 
00143 static void rna_Lamp_spot_size_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00144 {
00145     Lamp *la = ptr->id.data;
00146     la->spotsize = RAD2DEGF(value);
00147 }
00148 
00149 static void rna_Lamp_use_nodes_update(Main *blain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00150 {
00151     Lamp *la = (Lamp*)ptr->data;
00152 
00153     if (la->use_nodes && la->nodetree == NULL)
00154         ED_node_shader_default(scene, &la->id);
00155     
00156     rna_Lamp_update(blain, scene, ptr);
00157 }
00158

00161 EnumPropertyItem lamp_type_items[] = {
00162     {LA_LOCAL, "POINT", 0, "Point", "Omnidirectional point light source"},
00163     {LA_SUN, "SUN", 0, "Sun", "Constant direction parallel ray light source"},
00164     {LA_SPOT, "SPOT", 0, "Spot", "Directional cone light source"},
00165     {LA_HEMI, "HEMI", 0, "Hemi", "180 degree constant light source"},
00166     {LA_AREA, "AREA", 0, "Area", "Directional area light source"},
00167     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};

00169 static void rna_def_lamp_mtex(BlenderRNA *brna)
00170 {
00171     StructRNA *srna;
00172     PropertyRNA *prop;
00173 
00174     static EnumPropertyItem prop_texture_coordinates_items[] = {
00175         {TEXCO_GLOB, "GLOBAL", 0, "Global", "Use global coordinates for the texture coordinates"},
00176         {TEXCO_VIEW, "VIEW", 0, "View", "Use view coordinates for the texture coordinates"},
00177         {TEXCO_OBJECT, "OBJECT", 0, "Object", "Use linked object's coordinates for texture coordinates"},
00178         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00179 
00180     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "LampTextureSlot", "TextureSlot");
00181     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MTex");
00182     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Lamp Texture Slot", "Texture slot for textures in a Lamp datablock");
00183 
00184     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texture_coords", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00185     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "texco");
00186     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_texture_coordinates_items);
00187     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Coordinates", "");
00188 
00189     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "object", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00190     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "object");
00191     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Object");
00192     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00193     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Object", "Object to use for mapping with Object texture coordinates");
00194 
00195     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_color", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00196     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", LAMAP_COL);
00197     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Color", "Let the texture affect the basic color of the lamp");
00198     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00199 
00200     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_map_shadow", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00201     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mapto", LAMAP_SHAD);
00202     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow", "Let the texture affect the shadow color of the lamp");
00203     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00204 
00205     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "color_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00206     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "colfac");
00207     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00208     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Color Factor", "Amount texture affects color values");
00209     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00210 
00211     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00212     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "shadowfac");
00213     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1, 10, 3);
00214     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Factor", "Amount texture affects shadow");
00215     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00216 }

00218 static void rna_def_lamp_sky_settings(BlenderRNA *brna)
00219 {
00220     StructRNA *srna;
00221     PropertyRNA *prop;
00222 
00223     static EnumPropertyItem prop_skycolorspace_items[] = {
00224         {0, "SMPTE", 0, "SMPTE", ""},
00225         {1, "REC709", 0, "REC709", ""},
00226         {2, "CIE", 0, "CIE", ""},
00227         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00228         
00229     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "LampSkySettings", NULL);
00230     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "Lamp");
00231     RNA_def_struct_nested(brna, srna, "SunLamp");
00232     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Lamp Sky Settings", "Sky related settings for a sun lamp");
00233         
00234     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sky_color_space", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00235     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "sky_colorspace");
00236     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_skycolorspace_items);
00237     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky Color Space", "Color space to use for internal XYZ->RGB color conversion");
00238     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00239 
00240     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sky_blend_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00241     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "skyblendtype");
00242     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, ramp_blend_items);
00243     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky Blend Mode", "Blend mode for combining sun sky with world sky");
00244     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00245     
00246     /* Number values */
00247     
00248     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "horizon_brightness", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00249     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 20.0f);
00250     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Horizon Brightness", "Horizon brightness");
00251     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00252 
00253     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "spread", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00254     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00255     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Horizon Spread", "Horizon Spread");
00256     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00257 
00258     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sun_brightness", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00259     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00260     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sun Brightness", "Sun brightness");
00261     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00262 
00263     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sun_size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00264     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00265     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sun Size", "Sun size");
00266     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00267 
00268     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "backscattered_light", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00269     RNA_def_property_range(prop, -1.0f, 1.0f);
00270     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Backscattered Light", "Backscattered light");
00271     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00272 
00273     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sun_intensity", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00274     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f);
00275     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sun Intensity", "Sun intensity");
00276     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00277 
00278     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "atmosphere_turbidity", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00279     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "atm_turbidity");
00280     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1.0f, 30.0f);
00281     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 2.0f, 10.0f, 1, 2);
00282     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Atmosphere Turbidity", "Sky turbidity");
00283     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00284 
00285     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "atmosphere_inscattering", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00286     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "atm_inscattering_factor");
00287     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00288     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Atmosphere Inscatter", "Scatter contribution factor");
00289     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00290 
00291     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "atmosphere_extinction", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00292     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "atm_extinction_factor");
00293     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00294     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Atmosphere Extinction", "Extinction scattering contribution factor");
00295     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00296 
00297     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "atmosphere_distance_factor", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00298     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "atm_distance_factor");
00299     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 500.0f);
00300     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Atmosphere Distance Factor",
00301                              "Multiplier to convert blender units to physical distance");
00302     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00303 
00304     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sky_blend", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00305     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "skyblendfac");
00306     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 2.0f);
00307     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky Blend", "Blend factor with sky");
00308     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00309 
00310     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sky_exposure", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00311     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 20.0f);
00312     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky Exposure", "Strength of sky shading exponential exposure correction");
00313     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00314 
00315     /* boolean */
00316     
00317     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_sky", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00318     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "sun_effect_type", LA_SUN_EFFECT_SKY);
00319     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky", "Apply sun effect on sky");
00320     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00321 
00322     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_atmosphere", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00323     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "sun_effect_type", LA_SUN_EFFECT_AP);
00324     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Atmosphere", "Apply sun effect on atmosphere");
00325     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_sky_update");
00326 }

00328 static void rna_def_lamp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00329 {
00330     StructRNA *srna;
00331     PropertyRNA *prop;
00332 
00333     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Lamp", "ID");
00334     RNA_def_struct_refine_func(srna, "rna_Lamp_refine");
00335     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Lamp", "Lamp datablock for lighting a scene");
00336     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_LAMP_DATA);
00337 
00338     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00339     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, lamp_type_items);
00340     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Type", "Type of Lamp");
00341     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00342 
00343     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "distance", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00344     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "dist");
00345     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, INT_MAX);
00346     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1000, 1, 3);
00347     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Distance",
00348                              "Falloff distance - the light is at half the original intensity at this point");
00349     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00350 
00351     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "energy", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00352     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 10, 1, 3);
00353     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Energy", "Amount of light that the lamp emits");
00354     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00355 
00356     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "color", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_COLOR);
00357     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "r");
00358     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00359     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Color", "Light color");
00360     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00361 
00362     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_own_layer", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00363     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_LAYER);
00364     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Layer", "Illuminate objects only on the same layers the lamp is on");
00365     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00366 
00367     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_negative", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00368     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_NEG);
00369     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Negative", "Cast negative light");
00370     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00371 
00372     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_specular", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00373     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_NO_SPEC);
00374     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Specular", "Create specular highlights");
00375     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00376 
00377     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_diffuse", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00378     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_NO_DIFF);
00379     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Diffuse", "Do diffuse shading");
00380     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00381 
00382     /* nodes */
00383     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "node_tree", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00384     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "nodetree");
00385     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Node Tree", "Node tree for node based lamps");
00386 
00387     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_nodes", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00388     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "use_nodes", 1);
00389     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_ANIMATABLE);
00390     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Nodes", "Use shader nodes to render the lamp");
00391     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_use_nodes_update");
00392     
00393     /* common */
00394     rna_def_animdata_common(srna);
00395     
00396     /* textures */
00397     rna_def_mtex_common(brna, srna, "rna_Lamp_mtex_begin", "rna_Lamp_active_texture_get",
00398         "rna_Lamp_active_texture_set", NULL, "LampTextureSlot", "LampTextureSlots", "rna_Lamp_update");
00399 }
00400 
00401 static void rna_def_lamp_falloff(StructRNA *srna)
00402 {
00403     PropertyRNA *prop;
00404 
00405     static EnumPropertyItem prop_fallofftype_items[] = {
00406         {LA_FALLOFF_CONSTANT, "CONSTANT", 0, "Constant", ""},
00407         {LA_FALLOFF_INVLINEAR, "INVERSE_LINEAR", 0, "Inverse Linear", ""},
00408         {LA_FALLOFF_INVSQUARE, "INVERSE_SQUARE", 0, "Inverse Square", ""},
00409         {LA_FALLOFF_CURVE, "CUSTOM_CURVE", 0, "Custom Curve", ""},
00410         {LA_FALLOFF_SLIDERS, "LINEAR_QUADRATIC_WEIGHTED", 0, "Lin/Quad Weighted", ""},
00411         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00412 
00413     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "falloff_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00414     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_fallofftype_items);
00415     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Falloff Type", "Intensity Decay with distance");
00416     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00417     
00418     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "falloff_curve", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00419     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "curfalloff");
00420     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Falloff Curve", "Custom Lamp Falloff Curve");
00421     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00422 
00423     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_sphere", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00424     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_SPHERE);
00425     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sphere", "Set light intensity to zero beyond lamp distance");
00426     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00427 
00428     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "linear_attenuation", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00429     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "att1");
00430     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00431     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Linear Attenuation", "Linear distance attenuation");
00432     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00433 
00434     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "quadratic_attenuation", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00435     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "att2");
00436     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00437     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Quadratic Attenuation", "Quadratic distance attenuation");
00438     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00439 }
00440 
00441 static void rna_def_lamp_shadow(StructRNA *srna, int spot, int area)
00442 {
00443     PropertyRNA *prop;
00444 
00445     static EnumPropertyItem prop_shadow_items[] = {
00446         {0, "NOSHADOW", 0, "No Shadow", ""},
00447         {LA_SHAD_RAY, "RAY_SHADOW", 0, "Ray Shadow", "Use ray tracing for shadow"},
00448         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00449 
00450     static EnumPropertyItem prop_spot_shadow_items[] = {
00451         {0, "NOSHADOW", 0, "No Shadow", ""},
00452         {LA_SHAD_BUF, "BUFFER_SHADOW", 0, "Buffer Shadow", "Let spotlight produce shadows using shadow buffer"},
00453         {LA_SHAD_RAY, "RAY_SHADOW", 0, "Ray Shadow", "Use ray tracing for shadow"},
00454         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00455 
00456     static EnumPropertyItem prop_ray_sampling_method_items[] = {
00457         {LA_SAMP_HALTON, "ADAPTIVE_QMC", 0, "Adaptive QMC", ""},
00458         {LA_SAMP_HAMMERSLEY, "CONSTANT_QMC", 0, "Constant QMC", ""},
00459         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00460     
00461     static EnumPropertyItem prop_spot_ray_sampling_method_items[] = {
00462         {LA_SAMP_HALTON, "ADAPTIVE_QMC", 0, "Adaptive QMC", ""},
00463         {LA_SAMP_HAMMERSLEY, "CONSTANT_QMC", 0, "Constant QMC", ""},
00464         {LA_SAMP_CONSTANT, "CONSTANT_JITTERED", 0, "Constant Jittered", ""},
00465         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00466 
00467     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_method", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00468     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode");
00469     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, (spot)? prop_spot_shadow_items: prop_shadow_items);
00470     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Method", "Method to compute lamp shadow with");
00471     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00472 
00473     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_color", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_COLOR);
00474     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "shdwr");
00475     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00476     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Color", "Color of shadows cast by the lamp");
00477     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00478 
00479     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_only_shadow", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00480     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_ONLYSHADOW);
00481     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Only Shadow", "Cast shadows only, without illuminating objects");
00482     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00483 
00484     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_ray_sample_method", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00485     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "ray_samp_method");
00486     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, (area)? prop_spot_ray_sampling_method_items: prop_ray_sampling_method_items);
00487     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Ray Sampling Method",
00488                              "Method for generating shadow samples: Adaptive QMC is fastest, "
00489                              "Constant QMC is less noisy but slower");
00490     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00491 
00492     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, (area)? "shadow_ray_samples_x": "shadow_ray_samples", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00493     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "ray_samp");
00494     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 64);
00495     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, (area)? "Shadow Ray Samples": "Shadow Ray Samples X",
00496                              "Number of samples taken extra (samples x samples)");
00497     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00498 
00499     if (area) {
00500         prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_ray_samples_y", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00501         RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "ray_sampy");
00502         RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 64);
00503         RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Ray Samples Y",
00504                                  "Number of samples taken extra (samples x samples)");
00505         RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00506     }
00507 
00508     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_adaptive_threshold", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00509     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "adapt_thresh");
00510     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00511     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Adaptive Threshold", "Threshold for Adaptive Sampling (Raytraced shadows)");
00512     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00513 
00514     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_soft_size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00515     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "area_size");
00516     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 100, 0.1, 3);
00517     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Soft Size", "Light size for ray shadow sampling (Raytraced shadows)");
00518     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00519 
00520     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_shadow_layer", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00521     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_LAYER_SHADOW);
00522     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Layer", "Objects on the same layers only cast shadows");
00523     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00524 }

00539 static void rna_def_area_lamp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00540 {
00541     StructRNA *srna;
00542     PropertyRNA *prop;
00543 
00544     static EnumPropertyItem prop_areashape_items[] = {
00545         {LA_AREA_SQUARE, "SQUARE", 0, "Square", ""},
00546         {LA_AREA_RECT, "RECTANGLE", 0, "Rectangle", ""},
00547         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00548

00552     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_LAMP_AREA);
00553 
00554     rna_def_lamp_shadow(srna, 0, 1);
00555 
00556     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_umbra", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);

00558     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Umbra", "Emphasize parts that are fully shadowed (Constant Jittered sampling)");
00559     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00560 
00561     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_dither", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00562     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "ray_samp_type", LA_SAMP_DITHER);
00563     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Dither", "Use 2x2 dithering for sampling  (Constant Jittered sampling)");
00564     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00565

00567     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "ray_samp_type", LA_SAMP_JITTER);
00568     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Jitter", "Use noise for sampling  (Constant Jittered sampling)");
00569     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00570

00572     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "area_shape");
00573     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_areashape_items);

00575     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");

00581     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");

00597 static void rna_def_spot_lamp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00598 {
00599     StructRNA *srna;
00600     PropertyRNA *prop;
00601 
00602     static EnumPropertyItem prop_shadbuftype_items[] = {
00603         {LA_SHADBUF_REGULAR , "REGULAR", 0, "Classical", "Classic shadow buffer"},
00604         {LA_SHADBUF_HALFWAY, "HALFWAY", 0, "Classic-Halfway",
00605                              "Regular buffer, averaging the closest and 2nd closest Z value to reducing "
00606                              "bias artifacts"},
00607         {LA_SHADBUF_IRREGULAR, "IRREGULAR", 0, "Irregular",
00608                                "Irregular buffer produces sharp shadow always, but it doesn't show up for raytracing"},
00609         {LA_SHADBUF_DEEP, "DEEP", 0, "Deep",
00610                           "Deep shadow buffer supports transparency and better filtering, at the cost of "
00611                           "more memory usage and processing time"},
00612         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00613 
00614     static EnumPropertyItem prop_shadbuffiltertype_items[] = {
00615         {LA_SHADBUF_BOX , "BOX", 0, "Box", "Apply the Box filter to shadow buffer samples"},
00616         {LA_SHADBUF_TENT, "TENT", 0, "Tent", "Apply the Tent Filter to shadow buffer samples"},
00617         {LA_SHADBUF_GAUSS, "GAUSS", 0, "Gauss", "Apply the Gauss filter to shadow buffer samples"},
00618         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00619 
00620     static EnumPropertyItem prop_numbuffer_items[] = {
00621         {1, "BUFFERS_1", 0, "1", "Only one buffer rendered"},
00622         {4, "BUFFERS_4", 0, "4", "Render 4 buffers for better AA, this quadruples memory usage"},
00623         {9, "BUFFERS_9", 0, "9", "Render 9 buffers for better AA, this uses nine times more memory"},
00624         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00625 
00626     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "SpotLamp", "Lamp");
00627     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "Lamp");
00628     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Spot Lamp", "Directional cone lamp");
00629     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_LAMP_SPOT);
00630 
00631     rna_def_lamp_falloff(srna);
00632     rna_def_lamp_shadow(srna, 1, 0);
00633 
00634     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_square", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00635     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_SQUARE);
00636     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Square", "Cast a square spot light shape");
00637     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00638 
00639     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_halo", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00640     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_HALO);
00641     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Halo", "Render spotlight with a volumetric halo");
00642     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00643 
00644     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "halo_intensity", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00645     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "haint");
00646     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 5.0, 0.1, 3);
00647     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Halo Intensity", "Brightness of the spotlight's halo cone");
00648     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00649 
00650     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "halo_step", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00651     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "shadhalostep");
00652     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 12);
00653     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Halo Step", "Volumetric halo sampling frequency");
00654     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00655 
00656     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_size", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00657     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "bufsize");
00658     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 512, 10240);
00659     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Size",
00660                              "Resolution of the shadow buffer, higher values give crisper shadows "
00661                              "but use more memory");
00662     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Lamp_buffer_size_set", NULL);
00663     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00664 
00665     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_filter_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00666     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "filtertype");
00667     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_shadbuffiltertype_items);
00668     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Filter Type", "Type of shadow filter (Buffer Shadows)");
00669     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00670 
00671     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_sample_buffers", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00672     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "buffers");
00673     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_numbuffer_items);
00674     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Sample Buffers",
00675                              "Number of shadow buffers to render for better AA, this increases memory usage");
00676     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00677 
00678     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "spot_blend", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00679     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "spotblend");
00680     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f ,1.0f);
00681     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Spot Blend", "The softness of the spotlight edge");
00682     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00683 
00684     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "spot_size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_ANGLE);
00685     /* RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "spotsize"); */
00686     RNA_def_property_range(prop, M_PI/180.0, M_PI);
00687     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Spot Size", "Angle of the spotlight beam");
00688         /* only for deg/rad conversion */
00689     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_Lamp_spot_size_get", "rna_Lamp_spot_size_set", NULL);
00690     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00691 
00692     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_cone", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00693     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode", LA_SHOW_CONE);
00694     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Show Cone",
00695                              "Draw transparent cone in 3D view to visualize which objects are contained in it");
00696     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00697 
00698     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_clip_start", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00699     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "clipsta");
00700     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 9999.0f);
00701     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Clip Start",
00702                              "Shadow map clip start, below which objects will not generate shadows");
00703     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00704 
00705     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_clip_end", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DISTANCE);
00706     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "clipend");
00707     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 9999.0f);
00708     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Clip End",
00709                              "Shadow map clip end, beyond which objects will not generate shadows");
00710     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00711 
00712     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_bias", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00713     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "bias");
00714     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.001f, 5.0f);
00715     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Bias", "Shadow buffer sampling bias");
00716     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00717 
00718     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_soft", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);

00720     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 100.0f);
00721     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Soft", "Size of shadow buffer sampling area");
00722     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00723 
00724     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shadow_buffer_samples", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00725     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "samp");
00726     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 16);
00727     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Samples", "Number of shadow buffer samples");
00728     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00729

00731     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "buftype");
00732     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_shadbuftype_items);
00733     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shadow Buffer Type", "Type of shadow buffer");
00734     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");
00735 
00736     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_auto_clip_start", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00737     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "bufflag", LA_SHADBUF_AUTO_START);
00738     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Autoclip Start",
00739                              "Automatic calculation of clipping-start, based on visible vertices");
00740     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00741 
00742     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_auto_clip_end", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00743     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "bufflag", LA_SHADBUF_AUTO_END);
00744     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Autoclip End", "Automatic calculation of clipping-end, based on visible vertices");
00745     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_draw_update");
00746 
00747     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "compression_threshold", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);

00749     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);

00751     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Lamp_update");

00754 static void rna_def_sun_lamp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00755 {
00756     StructRNA *srna;
00757     PropertyRNA *prop;
00758 
00759     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "SunLamp", "Lamp");
00760     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "Lamp");
00761     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Sun Lamp", "Constant direction parallel ray lamp");
00762     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_LAMP_SUN);
00763 
00764     rna_def_lamp_shadow(srna, 0, 0);
00765 
00766     /* sky */
00767     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sky", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00768     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00769     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "LampSkySettings");
00770     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Lamp_sky_settings_get", NULL, NULL, NULL);
00771     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sky Settings", "Sky related settings for sun lamps");
00772 
00773     rna_def_lamp_sky_settings(brna);
00774 }

00785 
00786 void RNA_def_lamp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00787 {
00788     rna_def_lamp(brna);
00789     rna_def_point_lamp(brna);
00790     rna_def_area_lamp(brna);
00791     rna_def_spot_lamp(brna);
00792     rna_def_sun_lamp(brna);
00793     rna_def_hemi_lamp(brna);
00794     rna_def_lamp_mtex(brna);
00795 }
